column4: how can one obtain kernel devel sources without an internet connection?
i need to patch my kernel, yet i cant connect to apt-get
can you connect to apt-get on another computer?
yes i can connect to apt on another computer
all i have is a flash drive and other computers with an internet connection..but no connection on the computer needing the devel sources
you can just download with apt-get -d
apt-proxy? i mean the computer has no working ethernet // wireless devices at all
need a kernel recompile to fix
i dont know that setting up a proxy would help..at a quick glance
or just download the debs on another computer and take them over with a USB key
